node.value: Create user-friendly web interface for browsing reports and managing subscriptions

chamber-project.title: Chamber
chamber-project.content:
Generate daily & weekly reports of political sittings and distribute them to a user base
via a website experience & optional emails.Chamber aims to make political information more accessible by automatically generating
digestible reports from parliamentary proceedings and delivering them directly to citizens
who want to stay informed about their government's activities.Researched various sources for parliamentary data, including official government APIs,
web scraping opportunities, and data availability across different jurisdictions.Build the core system that processes parliamentary data and generates human-readable reportsImplement email subscription system with personalized report deliveryCreate user-friendly web interface for browsing reports and managing subscriptionsThis project represents my belief that technology should be used to increase civic
engagement and make democracy more accessible to everyday people.
